definitions: the action or process of gradually writing off the initial cost of an asset

examples.text: due to the amortization of initial costs, the risks of negative working capital are mitigated

shortDefinitions: action of gradually writing off initial cost of asset

definitions: the action or process of reducing or paying off a debt with regular payments

examples.text: because of amortization, you’ll own your home by the end of the loan term
an amortization schedule shows your payments each month and how it affects the total amount you owe

shortDefinitions: action of reducing debt with regular payments

definitions: a period in which a debt is reduced or paid off by regular payments

examples.text: 75% of the mortgages have an amortization of 25 years or less

shortDefinitions: period in which debt is reduced or paid off
